price: ߊ߬ ߘߏ߲߬ ߕߍ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߘߌߦߊ߫ ߝߋߎ߫ ߝߏ߫ ߊ߬ ߓߊ߯ ߖߊ߯ߓߊ ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߊߟߊ߫ ߘߌߦߊ߫
arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wamā tashāūna illā an yashāa al-lahu rabbu al-ʿālamīna
